bibdata.title: Standard for Wireless Access in Vehicular Environments (WAVE)
Networking Services
Standard for Wireless Access in Vehicular Environments (WAVE) - Networking Services
bibdata.docidentifier: IEEE Unapproved Draft Std P1609.3/D5.0, Mar 2010

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: WAVE Networking Services provides services to WAVE devices and systems. It represents roughly layers 3 and 4 of the OSI model and the IP, UDP, and TCP elements of the Internet model. The services provided include management and data services within WAVE devices.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
